activities: Xanterra and our subsidiaries receive information from customers who book reservations, visit our properties, or make purchases on our websites, as well as information from potential customers who make inquiries about our properties, tours and other services.   We also receive personal information from current and potential employees and independent contractors, when they apply for an open position, inquire about work opportunities, request reimbursements, or otherwise.
contactoff1: 6312 S. Fiddlers Green Circle Suite 600 North Greenwood Village, Colorado 80111
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer, client, organization, visitor, employee and independent contractor data.  Manually processed data may include printed resumes or other HR material submitted by job applicants or independent contractors, and some inquiries or reservations received through the mail or by fax.
